title: Todo List
summary: A website that allows users to create and manage their to-do lists
description: A comprehensive todo list application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features include task creation, editing, deletion, completion tracking, and local storage persistence. The app provides a clean, intuitive interface for managing daily tasks efficiently.
highlights: Real-time task updates and completion tracking
Filter functionality for better task organization

title: Animated Calculator
summary: A website that features an animated calculator with basic arithmetic operations
description: An interactive calculator application with smooth animations and modern design. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it provides all basic arithmetic operations with visual feedback and engaging animations for better user experience.
highlights: Responsive layout for all screen sizes

title: E-Commerce Platform
summary: A full-stack website built using the MERN stack featuring a comprehensive e-commerce platform
description: A complete e-commerce solution built with MongoDB, Express.js, React, and Node.js. Features include user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, payment integration, order management, and admin dashboard for comprehensive online shopping experience.
highlights: Admin dashboard for order and product management
challenges: Managing complex state across multiple components

title: Library Management System
summary: A website that enables users to manage library resources, including book cataloging and borrowing
description: A comprehensive library management system built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features include book cataloging, member management, borrowing and returning processes, search functionality, and due date tracking for efficient library operations.
highlights: Complete book cataloging and search system
Due date notifications and fine calculations
challenges: Implementing complex search and filter functionality
Managing relational data in local storage
learnings: User interface design for management systems

title: Password Generator
summary: A website that generates strong and unique passwords for users
description: A secure password generator application built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features customizable password criteria including length, character types, and complexity options. Includes password strength indicator and one-click copy functionality.
learnings: Security best practices for password generation

title: User Authentication React Native
summary: A mobile app that features a simple authentication flow, including login and user creation
description: A React Native mobile application demonstrating complete user authentication flow. Features include user registration, login, password recovery, profile management, and secure token-based authentication with biometric support.
challenges: Managing authentication state throughout the app

title: React MUI Vite
summary: A sample website built using React, MUI, and Vite, showcasing user fetching, grid showing, and nesting list selection
description: A modern React application built with Material-UI and Vite, demonstrating advanced UI components, user data fetching, responsive grid layouts, and complex nested list selection functionality with efficient state management.
highlights: Advanced data fetching and state management
challenges: Optimizing performance with large data sets

title: Simple Drawing App
summary: A drawing app that allows users to draw on screen, change colors, save drawings as PNG, and adjust brush size
description: An interactive drawing application built with HTML5 Canvas, CSS, and JavaScript. Features include multiple brush sizes, color palette, drawing tools, undo/redo functionality, and the ability to save drawings as PNG files.
highlights: Smooth drawing experience with HTML5 Canvas

title: Simple Text Editor
summary: A lightweight online editor that persists data to local storage with extensive formatting options
description: A feature-rich text editor built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Includes font selection, size adjustment, color customization, letter spacing, background colors, text formatting (bold, italic), alignment options, and automatic local storage persistence.
highlights: Automatic data persistence with local storage
